name: Panel Panic
description:
Hello!

This is a small casual project that I made over the Summer. Inspired by the games Pokemon Puzzle League and Panel de Pon. (These are pretty much the same game.)

If you are curious about the way that I implemented anything in this project. Feel free to download the github here: https://github.com/Gingerbread-Fetus/PDPProject (But do NOT distribute it or any of the assets within.)

Assets Used:

  • Kenney Game Assets (version 41)
  • Controller & Keyboard Icons
  • Deep Forest Pixel Tileset
  • Munro Font
  • 8 Bit Music Booster Pack
